name: arrayEvery
syntax: arrayEvery(array array, function(item, [index, [array]]) closure, [boolean parallel], [number maxThreads])
description: returns true if every closure returns true, otherwise false

params.name: closure
params.description: function / closure with the signature: any function (any item, [numeric index], [array array]) : boolean

params.name: parallel
params.description: Railo only option, true or false if the items can be executed in parallel

params.name: maxThreads
params.description: Railo only option, the number of threads to use when parallel = true
